text:
Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur Academic Senate and Board has approved launching of new 4-year BS and 5-year BS-MS programs in â€œStatistics and Data Scienceâ€ from the coming academic year 2021-22.  The admissions to the programs will be through JEE (Advanced).

Data Science, Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning are playing increasingly important roles in finding solutions to diverse real-world problems. Research in data science in the next 20 years is expected to focus on developing mathematically rooted models that can be implemented efficiently. The synergy of theory and applications requires training specific to a unique set of skills, and the BS and BS-MS programs in Statistics and Data Science have been launched in response to this need of effective implementation in real-life situations.

Students undergoing this program will be exposed to various types of structured and unstructured data with applications and will not only be well suited to build flourishing careers in industry and the new entrepreneurial India, but also to pursue higher studies in classical and modern statistics and data science. In collaboration with the proposed School of Medical Research and Technology (SMRT), students would also work on health-related data and digital health to give a much-needed boost to research and analytics in this important emerging area.

#artificialintelligence #DataScience #thatsiitk #SMRT #research #machinelearning

author: Pulkit  Pandey

text:
Henloo Bholu/Bhola/Bhole/BhOPla/Dora the Whora bahut kuch
This is gonna be a long memoir. I know I have many friends here, many as close as you, but I can't simply ignore the fact that who I used to rush to first in times of distress, and who always used to help me out. A L W A Y S

If I start figuring out how the friendship started, it was probably when I started to came to meet tarish, and then dipuk added me to the spammer grp. But I had absolutely no idea how important you'll be for me in the upcoming 3 years, and beyond

To consistent bitching about everyone, to late night mamamios, to innumerable spamming, to almost many many of the memorable aspects of my life at IITK, you have played a central part. China ki mkb, uski wajah se kitni planned trips reh gyi, but ab jaldi hi hogi I believe so ðŸ˜¤

Thanks to specially you, and many others, 1st year me jis hall 12 ki mkb karte the, almost became my second home, and I had enormous fun and gossip time there, especially D3, I can never forget the wing

Also jitni baar canteen me tere naam se khaaya hai bhaiðŸ¤£, wapas maangne mt lag jaana kangaal ho jaunga, ya wait doge se jo kamai hogi usse de dunga, ameer to hone wale hain hum XD

Aree haan, another important part, Pubg, valorant, oh bhai kitna khele hain humlog, pubg me to tum log pro the ekdam lmao, ajeeb lagta tha but still khelne aa jaata tha, anyway maza bahut aaya usme, sab cheezon me kahi na kahi ek memory rahi hi hai tujhse related jo ki humesha humesha yaad rahegi mujhe

Aur bhi kai cheezein hain ig, but ab aur nahi likhunga. Waise bhi ye wholesome nature apna inbuilt nahi hai, so Bhola Chutiya likhte hue khatam karta hu.

Thankyou for everything, I can't and can never thank you enough but still thank you for everything. Chal jaa cycling time ho raha hoga teraðŸ˜›

author: Pulkit  Pandey

text:
Henlo,
Starting with "Laut aao 2nd year wali diksha"
We first met before the trip to delhi ig, and that time I had no clue how important role you'll play in my college life. Since then we had so many trips, so many up downs, and of course you have changed by miles, but still I believe we share a great bond :p
Since you know it is impossible to encapsulate all those memories we made, I'll leave this memoir with a few positive words. Since I can boast off the fact that I have known you the best all these years XD, you were really one of those sweet and simple girls everyone would admire. I was well there though to witness the third year transition to your "Angry Goddess" role, and the final year wala introvert mode bhi, but over all those years, your empathy and kindness for others didn't change, which I am extremely proud of.
You know I am very bad at expressing emotions, hence I would just like to thank you for the innumerous times you've helped me, and for those innumerous memories throughout the life at IITK.
And no, I won't kill you XD
Regards
Pull K Yeet

text:
Henlo Coder Harish Dechiraju,
First of all you should thank me, I was one of those who made you popular ðŸ˜Œ.
But keeping it aside, you're that kind of guy who deserved to be popular, because you have that everlasting helping and cooperative attitude, that has been very beneficial for me and I am sure many others in the aero dept
I have seen a change in you after 2nd year tho, I don't know what it is,I can't explain but you have been more shy and introvert after that as I feel, although our personal relations remain the same ðŸ˜Ž. Before that you were lmao noov, now atleast in our group you're pru-most.
Keep spreading positive vibes around the world,noov. Also I admit that I've never met anyone more friendly in acads than you(maybe Sahil, or Bhola :p but they weren't much relevant in my dept XD, hence you retain the title)
Regarding football lol, messi is still greatest, admit it XD
Hoping to spend another fantastic year with you soon, and I am sure we'll have whole lot of photos
Till then stay the same Bangaram as you're
Your **ðŸ…±ï¸ðŸ…±ï¸* stealer PP

text:
Henlo Mahajan Dipak Anil,
**
**
**
infinite no of texts depicting emotions
**
**
**
I am sorry but I can't express emotions like others,and it's too tough for me to write a memoir describing how our life has been, now that it's coming to an end.
But I would miss you dearly, and there will be a void over my next 1 year at campus which can't be filled.
It's painful to write it down but I miss you dearly, and I wish we could get 4 more years at campus (that too I feel would be less :p), so ending on a relatively positive note, I hope we meet and spend time together like this soon, and for your bright future ahead, I wish you the best you can have. I assure that you'll remain forever in my heart â£ï¸

text:
I have friends here and with most of them I have a decent gentle friendship. Thanks for being the one who let me enjoy the bitter but better side of friendship XD. Through continuous leg pullings, to threatening each other of texting other's through our phones, and to spontaneous sarcasms, two years passed.
Fir tune dhokha dia and wing badal liðŸ˜­, aur poora maggu and decent ban gayaðŸ˜­. U will not be forgiven for this ðŸ˜¤. But atleast what I love that your tendency to help others and specially me never got lost.
Chal ab doston ki itni bhi tareef nahi karni chahiye, waise andar se kitna seedha hai ye to mujhe ache se pata hai ðŸ˜. Bas waiting ab ki jaldi se trip ho jaaye GG. Also aage ki life ke liye good luck. Aur jaldi shaadi karna aur bulana waha ache se lenge tumhari ðŸ˜Œ
author: Pulkit  Pandey

text:
Pulkit was here XD
Just to remind you how last 2 years went by your daily spamming, and witty comments. Aise hi dusro ko hansaate rehna bhai, be this cheerful always
Jaha bhi raho tarakki karo, and always stay in touch <3
author: Pulkit  Pandey

text:
Chowkidaar | 3 logo ka khoon | Dahi | 10 saal | Sasta photographer | GOT | Jain Gali | Gannaur | Parent Hall - Hall 12 | Ek kaan kharab | Canteen aajao | Nuclear Physics | HC Verma | Some xyz music app | Sachin | A few more.... |

Tried to encapsulate you in these. Not complete but almost perfect. Can confirm you are the only person I like talking physics with, eagerly looking for more such sessions :)
author: Pulkit  Pandey

text: Can confirm a great guy to chill out with ðŸ˜‚. Always was nice gossiping with you. A year more awaits ðŸ™Œ

Aero ke kaafi courses me saath kaam.kia hai. Humesha help karne ke liye thanks a lotðŸ˜
Aage jaha bhi jaao uske liye wishing you all the very best

author: Pulkit  Pandey

text:
From judging each other at day 1 too crying together at the last day, we really came a long way :) Looking forward to early return to campus <3
Also looking forward to your marriage, fir bc campus reunion hoga dbot ka :p
author: Pulkit  Pandey

text: "Bhai sirf shakal hi kyu milti" XD, khair one of the most enthusiastic persons I know. Antaragni me dance dekhke to alag hi maza aaya lol. Also 4 saal jo jo bakchodi ki wo bhi kaafi memorable raha.US jaake bhool na jaana ðŸ˜—
